alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 15 at 2:49AM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible for Arlington and up to 58 mph for the south Laramie Range. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills and South Laramie Range. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Some areas of blowing snow may be possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range
